Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Could you please kindly confirm that we can go ahead and order the new carpet for the Versace store in MOE from our budget as for now,  and after we will reimburse it from the insurance company with your kind support.

 

The reason is that the production of the carpet is taking 2 to 3 months and I need to place the order ASAP to be able to meet a high season with the properly presented store.

 

Please let me know if you have any question.

 

Thank you,

 

Best regards,

 

Lada
